item.description:
Szechuan Tokyo started as an Asian-fusion restaurant in 1999. As popular as ever, additional to the restaurant the company has included in its operations a vast wholesale sushi group, a catering group, and the Entertainment Group, which provides products and consulting services associated with the music industry to a wide variety of clients. The Entertainment Group also offers products and services which exploit its vast resources (e.g., production, information technology, design).

What about the restaurant?
Although the term "Asian-fusion" is used when describing the restaurant, Szechuan Tokyo never fuses the cuisine on the plate. Rather, we serve authentic home-style Sichuan cuisine, banquet-style delicacies, sushi and sashimi, and cooked Japanese specialties. No expense is spared when creating our dishes with authentic, premium ingredients that are impeccably fresh.

Home of the "Jazz Bar;" our wine and liquor operation is eclectic yet complete. From a delicate foreign or domestic wine to the infamously "deadly" Scorpion Bowl, our signature cocktail for two, our beverage service has it all. Designated driver? Your soda or juice is on us.

Our mission is to serve great food and huge beverages at a value price; our variety empowers our customers to create the experience they desire; whether a quick, informal bite in the bar or a dress affair for a hundred persons -- "West Hartford's Asian Fusion Experienceâ„¢" is here every day of the year (but for Thanksgiving) to serve luncheon and dinner in a unique, eclectic setting.
item.name: Asian Christmas Eve
